results.title: Abridge Becomes First-Ever Generative AI Company to ...
results.content: # **Abridge Becomes First-Ever Generative AI Company to Earn Triple Top Five Ranking in KLAS Emerging Solutions Report Including No. 1 for Clinician Experience** PITTSBURGH & SAN FRANCISCO--(BUSINESS WIRE)--Today, Abridge became the first generative AI company to be ranked across three of four categories in the KLAS Emerging Solutions Top 20 Report, which highlights exceptional technology partners based on insights from 49 healthcare-technology thought leaders and executives across the country. SAN FRANCISCO--(BUSINESS WIRE)--Abridge, a leading generative AI platform for clinical conversations, is expanding its capabilities to support inpatient care settings and queue up outpatient orders—extending the value of clinical conversations through additional integrated workflows as part of Workshop, a program through which Epic and Abridge have worked together to develop new, innovative healthcare technologies that are piloted and refined before wider release.

results.title: Announcing Abridge Inside for Inpatient and Outpatient ...

results.title: Abridge Reviews, Pricing, Features & Integrations - Elion
results.content: Abridge is an AI-powered tool that transforms patient-clinician conversations into structured clinical notes for EMRs, offering real-time transcription and highlights of key medical information from various types of healthcare appointments. Abridge is an AI-enabled documentation tool generating billable, structured clinical notes integrated with EHR workflows. Athenahealth has partnered with Abridge to embed its ambient AI clinical documentation technology directly into athenaOne, enabling real-time, automated note generation from patient visits to reduce clinician workload and streamline EHR workflows. Nuance DAX is an ambient clinical intelligence solution that automatically documents patient encounters and is integrated with EHR systems. Suki Assistant is an AI-powered clinical assistant designed to help healthcare providers with tasks such as documentation, coding, patient summaries, and clinical Q&A.

results.title: Abridge Contextual Reasoning Engine
results.content: # Abridge Contextual Reasoning Engine ## Once you see an Abridge note post Contextual Reasoning Engine Capture more precise problems by recognizing and grouping medical problems with language that aligns with appropriate billing codes. Abridge is an AI-powered tool that transforms patient-clinician conversations into structured clinical notes for EMRs, offering real-time transcription and highlights of key medical information from various types of healthcare appointments. Abridge is an AI-enabled documentation tool generating billable, structured clinical notes integrated with EHR workflows. Athenahealth has partnered with Abridge to embed its ambient AI clinical documentation technology directly into athenaOne, enabling real-time, automated note generation from patient visits to reduce clinician workload and streamline EHR workflows. Nuance DAX is an ambient clinical intelligence solution that automatically documents patient encounters and is integrated with EHR systems. Suki Assistant is an AI-powered clinical assistant designed to help healthcare providers with tasks such as documentation, coding, patient summaries, and clinical Q&A.
